name: Keeper of the Grove 2
summary: Protect the magic gems in this free defense game online. Different creeps are already marching the roads intended to steal the jewels. Your task is to place the magic defenders on the strategic spots along the paths and defeat the enemy. Stone golems have enough fire power, but are ineffective against fast targets. Thus, team them up with water elementals that slow villains down. Created by the huge fans of the best arcade games online, this h5 game has a range of nice features for core players. For instance, it's one of the defense games with hard mode accesiible right in the main menu. It also offers enemy wave acceleration option and features a number of achievements and an extensive guide. Consult it to learn more about the skills of attackers and defenders, and revise magic spells. It's one of those online arcade games for boys and girls to enjoy equally.
